Seer Tanapi: The spirit of Kasha is a devil spirit of death and decomposition that recently appeared in the Immortal Plateau. This devil spirit is contaminating the symbol of the Hestui, the*gray bear*. I, Tanapi, have decided to remove the devil spirit, Kasha, who dishonors my tribe! But, I do not know how yet ...
